channel.title: Marketing on News
channel.description: Recent content in Marketing on News

item.title: Easy DOS and DONTS of Marketing Your Business
item.description: You’ve finally started your company.. But now what! When it comes to getting the word out to your customers, marketing your startup is your first priority! If you don’t have a platform, you don’t really have any existing customers. It does take a lot of time to get some traction going which is why 90% of startup companies fail. The biggest reason is that they are making major mistakes when it comes to strategizing and how they use the current marketing content that we have available to us.
